text: The Hustle is a 2019 American comedy movie directed by Chris Addison. It is a remake of the 1988 movie Dirty Rotten Scoundrels. The movie stars Anne Hathaway, Rebel Wilson, and Alex Sharp. It is about two women who want to steal the money of an internet millionaire. It was released on May 10, 2019 to negative reviews. ==References== Category:2019 comedy movies Category:American comedy movies
title: The Hustle (movie)
